description: Detects updates to Sysmon's configuration. Attackers might update or replace the Sysmon configuration with a bare bone one to avoid monitoring without shutting down the service completely
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Legitimate administrators might use this command to update Sysmon configuration.
name: Sysmon Configuration Update
query: (((process.executable.text:("*\\Sysmon64.exe" OR "*\\Sysmon.exe")) OR (winlog.event_data.Description:"System activity monitor")) AND process.command_line.text:("*\-c*" OR "*\/c*"))
